ygData.messageBody:
hmm well as to ending a few frames before the video I'm on cable connection if it makes any difference and watched from about half way through Kiblee's section to the end without sound, just for kicks and giggles I hooked into the T1 as well and same result on that. Maybe as well for those of us not in your guild or on your server some subtitle under the segment would be good to let us know what's going on, comments from the players like "die darn you... die already" or similar comments, would make it a little more interesting and enjoyable but altogether a well made entertainment piece and something you and your guild should be proud of
 
Flaumigavylke

Subject: Re: [EverQuest] New project
 
The music itself was a last minute change in regards to choice.  The original music was going to be form a ManOWar compilation but I chose the Klingon Battle theme  at the last minute.  I've actually viewed the film on 4 different computers already each with a  different set up  and on all these comps the Film ends  like maybe  3 or 4 measures before the music does. And thats after I've played the film once then hit refresh..  On the first go round when the film is loading up The Vid itself ends the way I wanted it to by fading out when the music does.
